cyclone.name: DELTA
cyclone.current_location: about 310 mi south of Cameron, Louisiana
cyclone.trajectory: Turning north and then north-northeast while tracking toward the southwest-central Louisiana coast and the Upper TX/LA border area
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: near Cameron, Louisiana (between High Island TX and Morgan City LA)

weather_observation.watch_coast: East of the mouth of the Pearl River to Bay St. Louis, MS (TS Watch – not affecting Port Freeport)
weather_observation.warning_coast: Tropical Storm Warning – West of High Island to Sargent, TX; Hurricane Warning – High Island, TX to Morgan City, LA
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Northern Gulf Coast from High Island, TX eastward across Louisiana to Mississippi
weather_observation.wind: Tropical-storm-force winds (35–45 mph, gusts higher) possible Friday, diminishing Friday night.
weather_observation.storm_surge: 1–3 ft surge possible along the Brazoria County coast including Freeport, especially at times of high tide.
weather_observation.rainfall: 3–5 inches of rain possible Friday into early Saturday with localized higher totals producing brief flooding of low-lying areas.
weather_observation.other_hazards: High surf and dangerous rip currents; slight tornado risk shifts east of the port.
